title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.1 - Compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.1 - Compliance

State Regulations

All traffic in, at or upon any terminal or terminal highway, must at all times comply with any lawful order, signal or direction of any
authorized authority representative. Where such traffic is controlled by
traffic lights, signs, mechanical or electrical signals, or pavement markings, such lights, signs, signals and markings shall be obeyed unless an authority
representative directs otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
